Name: Drake Caterpillar Pirate
Description:
Manufacturer: Drake Interplanetary
Focus: Transport

First introduced in 2871, Drake Interplanetary's Caterpillar has long proven to be a reliable, cost-effective multi-role vessel, capable of being outfitted for everything from mercantile operations to combat support. Long hailed as a hard-fought alternative to the ubiquitous Hull series, the Caterpillar is a freighter that doesn't skimp on weaponry or customization. This model features a unique livery applied by the previous owners.
